title: T206 JJ Clarke beater for trade.
author: steve B

posts.post_title: T206 JJ Clarke beater for trade.
posts.post_content:
I bought a slightly better copy of this card, so I'm interested in trading this one. SC350 factory 30. The back is pretty much the same as the front. 

Interested in trading for any other T206 I don't have that's in similar condition. Or.... T205? Or something else old. 

Steve B
[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=123&pictureid=3757[/IMG]
